key.name: active
key.description: Whether integration of Ubuntu One with gnome-settings-daemon is enabled or not.

key.name: priority
key.summary: Priority for loading Ubuntu One features in gnome-settings-daemon
key.description: The startup queue priority for the Ubuntu One gnome-settings-daemon plug-in.

key.name: checked-bookmark-file
key.summary: Whether the bookmarks file configuration has been done yet.
key.description: True if the bookmarks file has been configured with the Ubuntu One bookmark already.
